remarks: An alternate way to show a group operation.  Exercise 1 of [Herstein] p. 57.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isgrp2i.1 $e |- X e. _V $.
isgrp2i.2 $e |- X =/= (/) $.
isgrp2i.3 $e |- G : ( X X. X ) --> X $.
isgrp2i.4 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) -> ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) $.
isgrp2i.5 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> E. z e. X ( z G x ) = y ) $.
isgrp2i.6 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> E. z e. X ( x G z ) = y ) $.
isgrp2i $p |- G e. GrpOp $.
$d G x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
